name: Paratyphoid fever, unspecified
description: Infection due to Salmonella paratyphi NOS

name: Relapsing fevers
description:
Includes: recurrent fever
Excludes: Lyme disease (A69.2)

name: Louse-borne relapsing fever
description: Relapsing fever due to Borrelia recurrentis

name: Tick-borne relapsing fever
description: Relapsing fever due to any Borrelia species other than Borrelia recurrentis

name: Typhus fever
description: Excludes: rickettsiosis due to Ehrlichia sennetsu (A79.8)

description:
Excludes: chikungunya haemorrhagic fever (A92.0)
dengue haemorrhagic fever (A91)

name: Haemorrhagic fever with renal syndrome
description:

- epidemic
- Korean
- Russian
Hantaan virus disease
Nephropathia epidemica
Hantavirus disease with renal manifestations
Excludes:hantavirus (cardio)-pulmonary syndrome (B33.4+, J17.1*)

name: Rheumatic fever without mention of heart involvement
Rheumatic fever with heart involvement
description: Excludes: chronic diseases of rheumatic origin (I05-I09) unless rheumatic fever is also present or there is evidence of recrudescence or activity of the rheumatic process. In cases where there is doubt as to rheumatic activity at the time of death refer to the mortality coding rules and guidelines in Volume 2.

name: Erythema marginatum in acute rheumatic fever (I00+)
Fever of other and unknown origin
description:

- labour (O75.2)
- newborn (P81.9)
puerperal pyrexia NOS (O86.4)

name: Drug-induced fever
description: Use additional external cause code (Chapter XX), if desired, to identify drug.

description: Fever with chills/nFever with rigors /nPersistent fever

name: Fever, unspecified
description:
